g.H914: to divide (in variation senses literally or figuratively, separate, distinguish, differ, select, etc.)
g.H996: between (repeated before each noun, often with other particles); also as a conjunction, either...or
g.H2889: pure (in a physical, chemical, ceremonial or moral sense)
g.H929: properly, a dumb beast; especially any large quadruped or animal (often collective)
g.H5775: a bird (as covered with feathers, or rather as covering with wings), often collectively
g.H3808: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
g.H8262: to be filthy, i.e. (intensively) to loathe, pollute
g.H853: properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
g.H5315: properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or me...
g.H3605: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
g.H834: who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
g.H7430: properly, to glide swiftly, i.e. to crawl or move with short steps; by analogy to swarm
g.H2930: to be foul, especially in a ceremial or moral sense (contaminated)

g.H1961: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
g.H6918: sacred (ceremonially or morally); (as noun) God (by eminence), an angel, a saint, a sanctuary
g.H3588: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
g.H3068: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God

g.H376: a man as an individual or a male person; often used as an adjunct to a more definite term (and in such cases frequently not expressed in translation)
g.H176: desire (and so probably in Proverbs 31:4); hence (by way of alternative) or, also if
